Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>A cart won't budge unless it's <clr:0000>on
the tracks<clr:ffff>.

I could see things gettin' real messy if ya
try movin' it when it's not on the tracks.
Talk34: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>Hey! You! Don't go touchin' my mine cart.
Talk35: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>I can see the outside. Just a little farther.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think_01>My friends must not give a hoot about me
if they can't be bothered to come help me
outta here.
If I DO make it out, I'm never sharin' any
of my marbled rock roast with them.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Well...OK. I guess you know what's what.
Gotta be safe about this 'n' all.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>The track's broken. All ya gotta do is <clr:0000>send
me and the cart flying<clr:ffff>.

It's easy enough. Anyone can do it.


<sp:3:0:2:0301>Anyone except piddly little you.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_01>If I lose this cart, all that's left will be to
plop down here and wait to return to
the rock...
Please don't take it off wherever you like.
Talk12: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease_01>That was close... Barely made it out alive.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>At this rate...


<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:SurpriseL_01>I won't be able to go buy any more
marbled rock roast! This is my LAST one!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Not bad, considering how piddly you are.<sp:5:0:0>
Want a <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>as a reward?

...<sp:5:0:0>


<snd:Happy_01>Just kidding. <sp:5:0:0>The supply is running low,
and it's precious to me, so I can't part
with it.
Instead of that, I'll give you what I picked
up in the cave.
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I can't get in the cart like this. You did
this on purpose, didn't you.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>It's real simple. Just let me know
when I can get in the cart, and <clr:0000>send
it flying<clr:ffff>. Done.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh, but you're all piddly.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Round here, you can't get marbled rock
roast. Just ugly, <clr:0000>weird vehicles<clr:ffff>.

I'm gonna tell President Yunobo and get
my assignment changed.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Just when I thought help was finally on
the way, it's a piddly Hylian...

<snd:Think_01>The stinkin'<clr:0000> track broke<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:0:0>and now I'm
stuck here. 

None of the other workers even noticed.
Great. Just great.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So, yeah. <sp:5:0:0>You've gotta figure out a way to
get me outta here!
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Just let me know when I can get in the
cart, and <clr:0000>send it flyin'<clr:ffff>. That'll get me back
outside in a jiff.
It's easy enough. Anyone can do it.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Just let me know when I can get in the
cart, and <clr:0000>send it flyin'<clr:ffff>. That'll get me back
outside in a jiff.
It's easy enough. Anyone can do it.


<sp:3:0:2:0301>Anyone except piddly little you.
Talk60:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Thank you. Now I don't have to think
about returnin' to the dust all alone.

As a reward, I'll give ya what I found back
in the cave.
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Round here, you can't get rock roast.
Just ugly, <clr:0000>strange vehicles<clr:ffff>.

I'm gonna tell President Yunobo and get
my assignment changed.
Talk62:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, I'd like to, but it looks like your
pouch is full.

I have this large Zonai charge for ya, so
ya might wanna make some room for it.
Talk63:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You brought me all the way outside, so
I'll give ya a reward.

I've got this large Zonai charge I picked
up back in the cave. It's all yours once ya
have some room for it.
Talk64:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ya got room now? Great! Here's what I
found back in the cave.
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I'm not getting in when it's tilted like this.
It's too dangerous.
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Whoa!<sp:5:0:0> What?!<sp:5:1:0> Stop messing around, and
just do it!
Talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL_00>Even I get scared!<sp:5:1:0> If you're gonna get me
out of here, just do it already.

If you keep messing around like that,
I'm gonna get out.
Talk43: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseM_00>Ugh! I'm done with you.<sp:5:0:0> I'm getting out.
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:CallFar_00>Even I get scared, you know!<sp:5:0:0> So stop
messing around.

If you're gonna bring me outside, then all
you have to do is send the cart flying!
Talk45:
I mean, I can't exactly ask the prez
himself to do it.
Talk58:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_01>What if nobody comes to help? I don't 
wanna return to the dirt all by myself...
Talk59:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, OK. Gotta be safe, so I'll wait till
you're ready.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:SurpriseM_01>What're you doing?! Don't do anythin'
funny to my cart!
